settings.code:
ENGAGEMENT RING SIZING

Finding the right size for a ring or band can be simple. Use our easy guide to determine a comfortable fit.

shop rings

How Should my Ring Fit?

The ideal ring size should ensure comfortable wear throughout the day and in various climates. It should slide easily over the knuckle when putting it on and stay securely in place, even when shaking the hand or when the hand is facing downward.

If your ring tends to expand in warmer weather, we recommend choosing a size that is a quarter size larger. At Stienhardt, we provide a wide selection of rings and bands available in all standard sizes, including half and quarter sizes. Shop with assurance!

Average Ring Sizes

Women’s ring sizes typically range from 3 to 9 within the United States. The most common women’s ring sizes are from size 6 to 7. The most popular men’s U.S. ring size is size 9.

How to Resize Your Ring

Most rings and bands can be resized within a few sizes. At Stienhardt, we offer complimentary resizing for engagement rings and wedding bands.

While it is typically okay to move a few sizes up or down, try to stay within two finger sizes. Resizing a ring or band any more than two finger sizes can be difficult. When choosing a ring size for yourself or a loved one, it may be a good idea to choose a slightly larger size.

settings.heading: METHOD NO. 1
settings.description: Simply ask your partner. If they know that you are about to propose, you can still surprise her with the ring style and center stone and in the process ensure that the ring is a perfect fit.

settings.heading: METHOD NO. 2
settings.description: Discreetly take a ring they currently own and recently wore on the ring finger. Then take it to a local jewelry repair shop. They can quickly and easily tell you the ring size. Remember! Ensure the ring you’re measuring is typically worn on the ring finger.

settings.heading: DELIBERATELY DIFFERENT NO. 3
settings.description: Are you planning a surprise proposal or ring gift? There are a few ways to find ring size without spoiling the sweet gesture.

settings.code:
See our printable sizing guide to make finding the right size an easy process for your band or ring. See our expert gemologist advice for more on finger sizing while keeping your surprise.
